mapper.select:
SELECT corp1.BUILD_NAME, corp1.DEVELOP_COMPANY, corp1.BUILD_ADDRESS, corp1.DISTRICT_NAME,
t.ALIAS, t.LOCATION_LNG, t.LOCATION_LAT, t.START_TIME, t.END_TIME, t.USED_TIME, t.GREEN_RATE, t.VOLUM_RATE, t.MANAGE_FEE, t.AVRAGE_PRICE, t.BUILD_AREA, t.PARK_SPACE, t.BUILD_INFO, t.RELATIVE_INFO, t.FLOOR_NAME, t.BUILD_LOCATION, t.FOOT_AREA, t.UNIT_NAME, t.ROOM_NAME, t.SUIT_PNG, t.BUILD_PNG, t.USAGE_MUL, t.ROOM_STRUCT, t.ROOM_AREA, t.SUIT_AREA, t.DISP_AREA FROM (SELECT middle1.ALIAS, middle1.LOCATION_LNG, middle1.LOCATION_LAT, middle1.START_TIME, middle1.END_TIME, middle1.USED_TIME, middle1.GREEN_RATE, middle1.VOLUM_RATE, middle1.MANAGE_FEE, middle1.AVRAGE_PRICE, middle1.BUILD_AREA, middle1.PARK_SPACE, middle1.BUILD_INFO, middle1.RELATIVE_INFO,
xzdetail.FLOOR_NAME, xzdetail.BUILD_LOCATION, xzdetail.FOOT_AREA, xzdetail.UNIT_NAME, xzdetail.ROOM_NAME, xzdetail.SUIT_PNG, middle1.BUILD_PNG, xzdetail.USAGE_MUL, xzdetail.ROOM_STRUCT, xzdetail.ROOM_AREA, xzdetail.SUIT_AREA, xzdetail.DISP_AREA, middle1.corpID, middle1.BUILD_NAME FROM xzdetail LEFT JOIN middle1 ON xzdetail.item_id = middle1.item_id) t LEFT JOIN corp1 ON t.corpID = corp1.corpID AND t.BUILD_NAME = corp1.BUILD_NAME WHERE corp1.DISTRICT_NAME = '贾汪区' LIMIT 0,10
